title: Update the all the deps to get the fixed offsets
description: Updates dependencies to their latest versions to ensure fixed offsets are applied correctly.

title: chore: workflow to update the cli package to the latest
description: Adds a GitHub workflow to automate the update of tscircuit packages to their latest versions when triggered.

title: test github automerge
description: Changes the upstream repository name in the GitHub Actions workflow configuration from pcb-viewer to test-github-automerge.

title: chore: parseKicadModToCircuitJson typo
description: Fixes a typo in the import statement for the parseKicadModToCircuitJson function in the README file.

title: fix: Manifold module to prevent loading state on subsequent renders
description: Fixes loading state issue for the Manifold module by implementing a global cache to store the initialized module, preventing unnecessary reinitialization on subsequent renders.
body:
## PR description

- Added global cache `window._CACHED_MANIFOLD_MODULE` to store initialized Manifold module 
- Initialize component state with cached module if available 
- Early return in useEffect when cached module exists 
- Store module in cache after successful initialization

## Video Demo 

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/33bde091-3906-4a46-baa0-bbbac4f1cafc

fixes https://github.com/tscircuit/tscircuit.com/issues/1695
/claim https://github.com/tscircuit/tscircuit.com/issues/1695

title: Fix the offsets by updating the circuti-to-svg
description: Fixes offset issues in SVG rendering by updating the circuit-to-svg dependency version to 0.0.202

title: Update the symbols dep to fix the offset issue
description: Updates the schematic-symbols dependency to version 0.0.202 to resolve an offset issue in symbol rendering.

title: Introduce "ineligible for sponsorship" list
description: Adds a list of users ineligible for sponsorship along with a function to check their eligibility, impacting the sponsorship calculation process.

title: Fix the chip offsets
description: Fixes the calculation of line endpoints for unconnected pins in the schematic rendering, ensuring accurate visual representation in the SVG output.

title: Add support for rendering soldermask part of SVG (if renderSolderMask : true)
description: Adds support for rendering the soldermask layer in SVG output when the renderSolderMask option is enabled.

title: when `do_not_place` the comment and value column is having `DNP` and the JLCPCB part column in empty
description: Sets the comment and value columns to DNP when the do_not_place flag is true, and clears the supplier part number columns accordingly.

title: Update the req deps to get the offsets fixed
description: Updates the version of dependencies to fix offset issues in the application.

title: fix: fetch the number of packages and members under orgs
description: Fetches the number of packages and members for organizations in the application.

title: Remove the old build page and unused components
description: Removes the old build page and associated unused components from the codebase, streamlining the application.
body:
This is how it looks now

title: refactor: Link
description: Replaces PrefetchPageLink components with Link components from the wouter library across various components in the application.

title: fix(FileSidebar): adjust padding in sidebar button for improved layout
description: Adjusts padding in the sidebar button to enhance layout consistency.

title: disable account balance display
description: Disables the display of the account balance in the header login component.

title: dont show rpeview button if failed
description: Hides the review button in the Package Releases Dashboard when the latest build status is error.

description: Updates the version of the schematic-symbols dependency from 0.0.201 to 0.0.202 in package.json

title: Add stock number to jlcpcb search results in import dialog
description: Adds stock number information to the JLCPCB search results displayed in the import dialog, enhancing user visibility of component availability.

title: Add ImportComponentDialog2 and ImportComponentDialogForCli
description: Add ImportComponentDialog2 and ImportComponentDialogForCli components for importing electronic components from various sources including tscircuit.com, JLCPCB, and KiCad.

title: adjust zindex in FileMenuLeftHeader
description: Adjusts the z-index of the DropdownMenuContent in the FileMenuLeftHeader component to ensure proper layering in the UI.

description: Updates the version of the circuit-json-to-bom-csv dependency from 0.0.7 to 0.0.8 in package.json

title: chore: add worflow to update cli with latest runframe
description: Adds a GitHub workflow to update the CLI with the latest version of RunFrame upon pushing to the main branch.

title: chore: update packages @tscircuit/3d-viewer
description: Updates the tscircuit3d-viewer package to version 0.0.402 in the package.json file

title: Support building index entrypoint when *.board.tsx and *.circuit.tsx files aren't found
description: Adds a fallback in the build process to detect and build the main entrypoint when no circuit or board files exist, ensuring that index.tsx is built when it is the only entrypoint.
body:
## Summary
- add a fallback in `tsci build` to detect and build the main entrypoint when no circuit/board files exist
- cover the new behavior with a CLI build test that ensures `index.tsx` is built when it is the only entrypoint

## Testing
- bun test tests/cli/build/build.test.ts
- bunx tsc --noEmit
- bun run format

------
